description:
Kirby's Ready to Ride! Prepare for fast and furious racing action as Kirby hits Warpstar speed! Use ultra-simple
controls to race and battle your pals in one of three hectic game modes!

v0.1.0.description:
Some updates to make the client a little better, and item receive should be more reliable. 

Implemented the 1 HP trap item. 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.0.1...v0.1.0
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.2.0.description:
- Fix receiving duplicate permanent patches when receiving them outside of City Trial and then entering
- Added new effect item: full heal
- Trap chance option now works
- Option to enable/disable effect items
- Misc client and docs updates

## What's Changed
* update docs by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/3
* Misc updates by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.3.0.description:
- Adds Air Ride locations and goals
- Adds EnergyLink
- Large code refactor to use enums instead of hardcoded values for many things
- Locations now properly set ProgressType
- Generalized stage transitions to any stage
- Add All Down and HP Down items
- Many other tweaks and fixes for things that didn't actually work before


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
- Bug fix to fix generation failing due to lack of filler items when traps and effect items were disabled

## What's Changed
* Add Filler item to avoid failing generation by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/9


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
- Adds Top Ride locations, options, goals, regions, etc.
- Fix item giving/make it more consistent
- Fixes deathlink sending after every air ride race, should only check for death in city trial currently
- update energylink docs to detail how to use it better
- other docs updates
- code restructuring and other tweaks

## What's Changed
* Add Top Ride by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/11
* Improve item giving, bug fixes, docs updates by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
- fix typo leading to generation failure
- update docs
- bump client version text to 0.4.1


## What's Changed
* Fix generation failing on default yaml by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/14

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1

v0.5.0.description:
- checkbox filler items for each checklist
- patch caps, patch cap increase items, /patch_cap client command
- progressive stadiums and stadium unlock items
- yaml options for all of the above
- use an items file to keep track of items received
- starting inventory is now fully supported
- better handling of patch item giving, works on more vehicles more of the time
- energylink permanent patches are now actually permanent (fixes https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/issues/13 )
- more location groups (RNG, PVP)
- added additional locations to high effort location groups
- added additional locations to city trial events location group
- show goals when connecting to a server
- location checking performance improvements
- docs updates
- many, many other code changes, tweaks, and bug fixes

## What's Changed
* Checkbox fillers, Patch Caps, Progressive Stadiums, Items File by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/15

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0
v0.5.0.title: v0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
- bump version to 0.5.1
- add archipelago.json manifest
- tweak region connections, add single race regions
- add stadium unlock items access rules to stadium region entrances (hopefully fixes stadium logic)
- fix missing excluded locations for Top Ride: Multiplayer
- patch item giving in Destruction Derby 4/5
- fix the client overriding the chosen random stadium unnecessarily
- fix stadium choice not respecting the chosen stadium category in game settings
- sync local checkbox state with server-received locations_checked packets on connection

## What's Changed
* Bug Fixes and Tweaks by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/23

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1
v0.5.1.title: v0.5.1

v0.5.2.description:
- bump version to v0.5.2
- fix printing debug output when generating
- use all location tables when syncing with server checked_locations

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.5.1...v0.5.2
v0.5.2.title: v0.5.2

v0.6.0.description:
**Changes**
- Logic fixes for goals and stadiums
  - Added goal event locations and goal event items
  - Spheres now properly appear
- New option to start with all checklists revealed
- Support for Item Link
- Tweaks to random stadium choosing logic
- Better current stage detection (hopefully less bugs)
- Removed the CheckboxRewardItems option until we can actually randomize the checklist
- Docs updates
- Bump version to v0.6.0
- Many misc. code improvements and refactoring

**Bug Fixes:**
- City Trial Free Run crash fixes
- Can no longer unlock goal checkboxes with checkbox fillers
- Syncing checkboxes with the server now reveals adjacent checkboxes properly
- Goal locations can no longer have other worlds' items on them
- Generation is now more reliable

## What's Changed
* 0.6.0 PR by @DeDeDeK in https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DeDeDeK/KARchipelago/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0
v0.6.0.title: v0.6.0
